platforms.name: OpenAI Whisper
platforms.description: OpenAI Whisper is an open-source automatic speech recognition (ASR) system that transcribes and translates speech from audio across dozens of languages. It is designed to be robust to accents, background noise, and technical language, making it highly versatile. Its unique value lies in being a state-of-the-art, general-purpose model that is freely available for both research and commercial use, trained on a massive and diverse 680,000-hour dataset.
keyFeatures: Speech translation from non-English languages to English
Robust performance in noisy environments and with diverse accents

platforms.name: Kaldi
platforms.description: Kaldi is an open-source speech recognition toolkit designed for both research and production environments. It provides a comprehensive framework for building speech recognition systems with state-of-the-art techniques, featuring extensive support for custom acoustic and language model training. What makes Kaldi unique is its robust C++ core with efficient WFST-based decoding, extensive documentation of research methods, and its role as a foundational codebase that has influenced many commercial and academic speech systems.
keyFeatures: WFST-based decoder for efficient speech recognition
Extensive C++ library for speech processing algorithms
Support for DNN, TDNN, and CNN acoustic models

platforms.name: OpenVoice v2
platforms.description: OpenVoice v2 is an advanced, open-source instant voice cloning toolkit developed by MyShell AI. It enables users to generate highly realistic and expressive speech from just a short reference audio sample, with precise granular control over voice styles including emotion, accent, rhythm, and tone. Its unique capability lies in its efficient, real-time voice conversion and its separation of tone color cloning from style parameters, allowing for high-quality voice synthesis without requiring extensive training data.
keyFeatures: Instant voice cloning from a short (seconds-long) reference audio sample
Fine-grained, independent control over voice style parameters (emotion, accent, rhythm, pauses)
Real-time voice conversion capability for live applications

platforms.name: OpenVoice v2
platforms.description: OpenVoice v2 is an advanced, open-source instant voice cloning engine developed by MyShell AI. It enables users to generate highly realistic and expressive synthetic speech from just a 3-second audio sample, capturing not only vocal timbre but also nuanced speaking style, emotion, and prosody. Its unique capability for fine-grained, cross-lingual control makes it a powerful tool for developers and creators seeking accessible, high-quality voice synthesis without restrictive licensing.
keyFeatures: Instant voice cloning from a minimal 3-second reference audio sample
Fine-grained control over speech style, emotion, accent, and prosody (rhythm, intonation, pauses)
Cross-lingual voice cloning: clone a voice and synthesize speech in languages not present in the reference sample
